title: Babes in Toyland Charity Toy Drive
desc: Since 2008, the Babes in Toyland Charity Toy Drive has been one of the hottest tickets in Hollywood during the Holiday season. Thousands of children in need have been the beneficiaries of the generous donation of toys made by event attendees through local non-profit organizations. ?This year, Babes in Toyland will benefit The Midnight Mission (www.midnightmission.org). The Midnight Mission is the oldest continuously operating human service organization in Los Angeles. Entertainment will be provided by DJ Cool Whip & DJ LC, Live Music by Berry Bly and Soulshaker plus surprise performances all night long Where: Avalon Hollywood 1735 Vine St. Hollywood When: Wednesday December 9, 2015 8pm-2am ? ? ? ? ? ?VIP Reception 8pm-10pm No autograph seekers or photohounds!
